EmailTemplate.name: Revised Proof
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Revised DealChicken.com Proof for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for providing feedback on your DealChicken proof. We have made the requested edits. Please review the final proof and respond with your approval by [deadline time, date].
You can view the final proof here: {!Opportunity.DC_Proof_Hyperlink__c}
Thank you,
